page.title: 16BANKING FACILITIES
page.content: {Banking day}is{Tuesday,}for the people on Sanday. Two Banks carry out business on the island. One is the {Royal Bank}and the other is the{Bank {of Scotland.}Their opening times are determined by the Loganair flight schedules, as the cashiers fly in from the Mainland:_ 11.00-12.30 in the morning and 1.30-3.45 in the afternoon. The Royal Bank operates from its own building, in Kettletoft 'Village', which was built in 1981. The bank of Scotland works from a room within Kettletoft Stores at the pier. Kettletoft is a busy place on a Tuesday with the additional cars transporting the islanders to and from one or other or both of the banks.
